function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Validation of preventive advice by medical experts, promotion of evidence-based prevention strategies","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Broaden keyword selection to capture all relevant preventive information, review and analyze a diverse range of articles","category":"Prevent fake news","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement social distancing measures and capacity limits for green spaces","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote use of local green spaces and limit long-distance travel","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promoting mental health support and community resilience","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public health education, behavior change interventions","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing inclusive urban planning, adopting green infrastructure","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement crowd control measures, maintain social distancing, and increase sanitation efforts","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Invest in maintaining and expanding green spaces, promote public awareness of the importance of green spaces, and provide equitable access to all residents","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving access to green spaces, creating alternative recreational areas","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Researching and implementing alternative urban planning strategies","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement measures to enable safe access to green spaces, and promote the benefits of nature interaction","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Advocate for the safe operation of green spaces and provide guidelines for safe visitation","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote the benefits of nature interaction and encourage the maintenance of indoor and outdoor greenery","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement crowd control measures, promote less crowded green spaces, and encourage staggered visiting hours.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote the use of local green spaces, improve amenities in local neighborhoods, and provide incentives for staycation activities.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Educate the public on safe outdoor activities, improve sanitation and hygiene facilities in green spaces, and promote outdoor socialization within safety guidelines.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcement of social distancing and mask-wearing in green spaces, regular disinfection of common surfaces.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public awareness campaigns, relaxation of restrictions, and provision of alternative indoor activities.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Education on outdoor safety measures, regular disinfection of public spaces, and promotion of outdoor activities with social distancing.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Flexible working hours, promotion of short outdoor breaks, and development of accessible green spaces close to residential areas.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase the availability of urban green spaces per capita, promote alternative outdoor recreation options.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote safe outdoor activities, provide guidelines for using green spaces during a pandemic, enhance accessibility to green spaces.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop alternative outdoor recreation areas, provide support for at-home physical activities, advocate for safe use of green spaces during pandemics.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporate additional data models, such as raster or network data, to complement vector data models in spatial through supplementary methods.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multiple data collection methods and validation measures to ensure data accuracy and completeness","category":"Monitoring and control of indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Peer review of spatial analysis methods, validation of spatial data with ground truth interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emphasize the importance of truthful and accurate responses","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use multiple data collection methods, provide assistance to those with limited internet access, and consider the potential biases in data analysis","category":"Monitoring and control of indoor air
